Name: maximize_team_productivity
Description: Maximize the total story points completed by all teams per sprint

Name: maximize_sprint_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points completed per sprint

Name: minimize_blockers
Description: Minimize the number of unresolved blockers during a sprint

Name: maximize_feature_completion
Description: Maximize the number of completed features in a release

Name: minimize_project_budget
Description: Minimize the total budget used across all projects

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the average team satisfaction from retrospectives

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Maximize the influence level of stakeholders participating in sprint reviews

Name: maximize_skill_coverage
Description: Maximize the number of unique skills covered by team members

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the percentage of sprint goals achieved

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort required for all tasks in a sprint

Name: maximize_epic_priority
Description: Maximize the priority of epics in the product backlog

Name: maximize_user_story_completion
Description: Maximize the number of completed user stories per sprint

Name: minimize_development_snapshot_bugs
Description: Minimize the number of bugs in development snapshots

Name: maximize_release_plan_features
Description: Maximize the number of features included in a release plan
